Gad is an old client to the organization who has applied for a loan of 800,000. He is age 49 years, married, and blessed with five children. He lives in Rwakabengo, Rukungiri district. He is a teacher, and has depended on this salary as his main source of income for 24 years; he does agriculture as an additional source of income. It’s from this salary that he has been able to get income and meet his family's needs. 

However, he realized that alone was not enough to meet his entire domestic financial needs, and he joined Ugafode for financial assistance; he took this loan to buy agriculture inputs, i.e fertilizer, to increase his agricultural production.  Gad is happy with Ugafode since it has enabled him to be where he is now.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Gissela

texts.es:
Gissela está cursando el 3er año de la carrea de Administración que terminaría el año que viene, viene de una familia de 4 hermanos de los cuales 1 ya se recibió y dos estudiantes al igual que él.
Espera conseguir y lograr sus metas en la vida por la cual está estudiando y preparándose en la carrera que eligió.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, ya que de esta manera podrá seguir con sus estudios, luchando por salir adelante.
texts.en: Gissela is in her third year of her administration degree, which she will finish in the next year.  He comes from a family of four brothers of which one already graduated, and two are currently in school.  She hopes to reach her goals in life, which is why she is studying and preparing for the career that she has chosen.  She is seeking this loan to pay her college tuition since it will allow her to continue with her studies and fight to get ahead.

loans.use: pay her college tuition.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge esta estudiando para poder ser un buen bioquímico, que sea útil a las personas de la sociedad, por medio del servicio que quiere ofrecer. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, lo que le fue de mucha ayuda y con lo que pudo seguir luchando.
Hoy pide devuelta un préstamo para poder invertirlo nuevamente en las cuotas de su universidad, ya que le será de mucha ayuda para poder seguir estudiando y luchando por sus metas.
texts.en: Jorge is studying to be a good biochemist who will be useful to society through the service he wants to offer.  He states that his previous loan was used to cover his college tuition, which was very helpful and allowed him to continue striving.  Today, he is asking for another loan to use for his college tuition because it will be very helpful to continue studying and working towards his goals.

loans.use: pay for his college tuition.

loans.name: Liliana Beatriz

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito La Unidas Somos Más. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.
En este lugar vive la señora Liliana, tiene 28 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 10 y 5 años que estudian en escuela. El marido trabaja en una camaronera. 	Ella estudio belleza en una academia de la localidad hace varios años.
Doña Liliana es una joven ama de casa que además de estar al tanto de su hogar también realiza todo tipo de arreglo personal en su casa y a domicilio,  ella realiza pintado de uñas, tinturados, corte de cabellos entre otras cosas. Poco a poco está comprando las herramientas necesarias para instalar su salón de belleza. Ella lleva más de 6 años dedicada a esta actividad y le va bastante bien.
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar esmaltes, tintes, herramientas y materiales de belleza para su trabajo. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace tres ciclos, es la presidenta del grupo  y le gusta porque los créditos son muy importantes para ella. Sus metas son tener un gran salón de belleza.
texts.en:
The members of the La Unidas Somos Más Credit Group meet every fifteen days in the Rocafuerte Canton. Rocafuerte is known for the delicious sweets that the local people make, which are renowned throughout the country. 

Señora Liliana, age 28, lives here. She has a common-law marriage from which she has two children, ages 10 and 5, who are studying in school. Her husband works on a shrimp farm, and she studied beauty at a local academy several years ago.

Doña Liliana is a young housewife; and in addition to this, she provides all types of personal grooming services in a room of her house, including manicures, hair coloring, and cutting.  Little by little she is purchasing the tools that are necessary to open her beauty salon.  She has been devoting herself to this occupation for more than six years, and she is doing very well. 

She is going to use this loan to purchase nail polish, hair coloring, tools, and beauty supplies for her work. She has been in the credit group for three cycles, and she likes it because the loans are very important for her. She is the president of the group. 

Her goal is to have a great beauty salon.

loans.use: to purchase nail polish, hair coloring, tools, and beauty supplies.

loans.name: Rene Alonso

texts.es:
Rene es un joven emprendedor de 22 años de edad, tiene educación media de nivel académico, está acompañado y tiene una hija de  un año de edad, solo ellos viven en casa y nadie más depende de Rene.


Rene es empleado, él trabaja ocasionalmente con la alcaldía de su municipio como contador, esto lo hace desde hace 2 años pero también es agricultor, oficio que aprendió desde pequeño con su padre y sus hermanos, cuando dejó de estudiar, se dedicó completamente a trabajos agrícolas pero luego se le presentó la oportunidad de trabajar en la alcaldía, de modo que es un joven que aprovecha las oportunidades para salir adelante.


El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar otra vaca, ya que solo cuenta con una pero tiene más demanda de clientes en la venta de leche y queso por lo tanto necesita comprar una vaca más para satisfacer esta necesidad.

Sus sueños son de más vacas lecheras, espera lograrlo con mucho esfuerzo pues es su fuente más fuerte de ingresos.
texts.en:
Rene is a young entrepreneur of 22 years old, he has a middle level of education, he has a partner and a daughter who is one year old, they are the only ones who live in his home and he has no more dependents.

Rene is employed, he occasionally works with the mayor of the municipality as an accountant, he has done this for 2 years but he is also a farmer, a job that he learnt when he was young with his parents and siblings. When he stopped going to school, he devoted himself entirely to farm work but then the opportunity presented itself to work in the town hall so he took it, as he is a young man who takes advantage of opportunities to get ahead.

He is requesting this loan as he needs to purchase another cow, as he only has one but he has more demand from his customers in the sale of milk and cheese and thus he needs to buy one more cow to meet this need. 

His dreams are of more milk cows, he hopes to achieve this with a lot of effort as this is his strongest source of income.

loans.use: to buy another cow as he only has one.

loans.name: Rossana

texts.es:
Rossana es casada vive con su marido, ambos son estudiantes universitarios. Ella está estudiando para tener un mejor futuro conseguir un trabajo estable y el  día de mañana poder darles una buena educación a sus hijos y ayudar  a toda su familia.
Su objetivo es tener un título universitario, para que pueda progresar y salir  adelante  por medio de la carrera de contador que eligió.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Rossana is married and lives with her husband.  They are both college students.  She is studying to have a better future, get a stable job, be able to provide her children with a good education, and to be able to help her family.  Her goal is to have a college degree so that she can develop and get ahead through a career as an accountant.  She is seeking this loan to pay for her tuition, which will be very helpful.

loans.use: pay her college tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: pay for her college tuition.

loans.name: Ninfa Maria

texts.es:
Ninfa tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, vive con sus padres y sus hijos de 10 y 11 años en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para la compra de abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, urea, fungicida. La compra lo realiza en Ventanas. Su meta es comprarse un vehículo. Su desafío es la  influencia del clima y plagas en sus cultivos. En su tiempo libre se dedica a los hijos.
texts.en:
Ninfa is 40 years old, her civil status is single, she lives with her parents and her children of 10 and 11 years old in the Canton Ventanas, Provincia de los Ríos.

She works in farming, growing corn. She is requesting a loan to buy manure, insecticide, fertilizer, urea and fungicide. She will make the purchase in Ventanas. 

Her aim is to purchase a vehicle. Her challenges are the climate and pests in her crops. She dedicates her free time to her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Sri Ramajayam Self Help Group 2- Natchiyar Kovil

texts.en:
Sri Ramajayam is a self-help group from Natchiyar Kovil village, Tamil Nadu. It is managed by the local NGO called People’s Action for Transformation (PAT). The group has been in existence for more than 5 years. Hemalatha is the leader of Sri Ramajayam Self-Help Group (SHG). Hemalatha is married, and her husband is a farmer by profession. They have a child, and the family is living in their own house. 

Now, the group members need a loan to purchase smokeless stoves produced by Greenway Grameen Infra. These stoves cost much less than 1,400 Indian rupees (INR). They reduce indoor air pollution, which means healthier women and healthier families as it is young children and women who spend the maximum amount of time in and around the kitchen.

loans.use: to purchase a smokeless stove

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough cartons of chicken to sell.

loans.name: Marío Ernesto

texts.es:
Mario de 43 años de edad, es soltero ya que estuvo en una relación que no funcionó, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, él vive con su hermana, su madre y un sobrino por lo tanto solo ellos dependen de él. 


Mario tiene 15 años de trabajar como carpintero, este trabajo lo aprendió observando, ya que le llamaba la atención la elaboración de muebles, antes él trabajaba de jornalero. El trabajo de carpintero lo realiza en su casa en un horario de 6:00 am a 5:00 pm.

Él necesita este préstamo para comprar una yunta de bueyes pequeños que le sirvan en el trabajo agrícola, espera venderlos cuando estén grandes, y de las ganancias comprar materiales para el trabajo de carpintería.

Sus sueños son hacer su casa para vivir en lo propio, comprar más herramientas para la carpintería y crecer poco a poco en este negocio.
texts.en:
Mario is 43 years old. He is single, as he was in a relationship that wasn't working out. He never had the opportunity to go to school. He lives with his sister, his mother and a nephew; therefore, they are the only ones depending on him.

Mario has been working as a carpenter for 15 years. He learned this work through observation, as furniture-making caught his attention. Previously, he worked as a day laborer. He does his carpentry work in his house on a schedule of 6:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

He needs this loan to buy a pair of young oxen to use in farming work. He hopes to sell them when they are grown, and with the earnings, purchase carpentry materials.

His dreams are to build his own house to live in, purchase more carpentry tools, and grow his business little by little.

loans.use: to purchase a pair of young oxen to use for farming; he hopes to sell them when they are grown, and with the earnings, buy materials for carpentry work.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es: Elva esta casada y no tiene hijos Ella vive en El Alto en una casa de adobe que es de su propiedad y solo tiene alcantarillado Elva se dedica a la artesania pero tambien esta incursionando en el mercado de juguetes baratos Elva necesita un credito para comprar juguetes para su nueva actividad Dice que este negocio tiene mucha proyección a futuro por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Elva is married and does not have children. She lives in El Alto in an adobe house that is her own property and only has a sewage system. She does handicraft work but is also getting into the used toy market. Elva needs a loan in order to purchase toys for her new work. She says that this business has a promising future, and therefore, she needs your help.

loans.use: to purchase toys for her new work.

loans.name: Pasamalar Self Help Group - Pallivayal

texts.en:
Chandra is the leader of the Pasamalar Self Help Group, which was formed by the local NGO, People Action for Transformation (PAT) in Tamil Nadu, India. Chandra lives in Pallivayal village, Tanjore district.

Chandra is 50 years old and lives in her own house with her children and husband. Her husband is a small marginal farmer. 

Chandra is requesting a loan to purchase a smokeless stove, which is better than the traditional mud stove. As the latter emits a lot of smoke, it is also called a kitchen killer as it consumes more time and money. The smokeless stove is affordable, designed for daily use and is much better than traditional stoves.

The other members are also requesting a loan for the same purpose and are hoping for a healthier life.

loans.use: to purchase a smokeless stove

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith, aged 34, is the mother of two school going children living in Hoima, Uganda. She deals in produce; mainly rice, beans and maize. She also earns a salary as a primary teacher. She hopes to expand her business. However, limited capital is still a challenge. She is acquiring a loan to buy more beans and maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El señor Mario, vive en el municipio de Entre Ríos del departamento de Cochabamba, se dedica al sector agrícola, trabaja en su terreno propio que adquirió con mucho esfuerzo durante la colonización, migrando de los lugares donde hay poco movimiento económico, actualmente  produce yuca, tiene 1 ha, los productos  los vende a los intermediarios que vienen a comprar al lugar de cosecha, la producción es familiar y a la vez contrata personal eventual que le colabora en el mantenimiento y en la cosecha de los productos. Su parcela de yuca le genera buenos ingresos económicos y es de fácil manejo. Ahora el señor solicita un crédito para ampliación de su producción y así obtener mejores cosechas, para generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mario lives in the city of Entre Ríos in the Cochabamba department. He earns a living in the agricultural sector. 

He works on his own land which he acquired with a lot of effort during colonization, moving from places where there was little economic movement. He currently produces cassava and has one hectare. He sells the products to intermediaries who come to the crop's location to buy it. 

The production is done by his family, and he also hires temporary staff who help him maintain and harvest the products. His parcel of cassava earns him good income and is easy to use. 

Now, he is seeking a loan to increase his production and thus obtain better crops to earn a better income.

loans.use: to expand his production of cassava.

loans.name: Heinert Patricio

texts.es:
Heinert tiene 18 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive con sus padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

El se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para la compra insumos agrícolas para los sembríos. Las compras lo realizan en Ventanas. Su meta es mejorar la producción de la siembra. Su desafío es el transporte y las plagas. En su tiempo libre se dedica a hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Heinert is 18 years old and single.  He lives with his parents in Ventanas Canton, part of Los Rios Province. He is a farmer who cultivates corn. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase agricultural supplies for his crops. He will make his purchases in Ventanas. His goal is to improve his yield. His challenge is transport and pests.

In his spare time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough goods such as flour, sugar, butter, etc. for baking

loans.name: Gordon

texts.en: Gordonr is a 28-year-old client who operates a retail shop as his major source of income but he also carries out agriculture production for additional income, He is applying for a loan of 2.000.000 UGX to add capital to his business, specifically to buy sugar, soap, and posho to serve more people in the area. He hails from a village in Kebisoni sub-county, Rukungiri district. He has operated his business for seven years. However, he has been faced with limited capital and competition to compete favorably in the market. He hopes that with this loan from UGAFODE, he can expand his business,

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his general store

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Todas las mañanas el sol de Sololá se asoma para ofrecer una nueva esperanza de cada día para todos aquellos seres humanos que luchan para seguir adelante en sus vidas cotidianas.

Dominga de 22 años es una de esas personas luchadoras y emprendedoras que cada día se levanta con esa mañana esperanzadora.  Se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras en el mercado central de Sololá desde hace dos años.

Ha solicitado un crédito con el propósito de comprarse un terreno.  Por poseer ese espíritu emprendedor tiene como meta ampliar más su negocio como única fuente de sus ingresos diarios.
texts.en:
Every morning the sun in Sololá appears and offers new hope each day to those people who work hard to get ahead in their daily lives. 

Dominga, who is 22-years old, is one of those hard-working and enterprising people who wakes up each day to that inspiring morning.  Dominga has made her living for the past two years buying and selling vegetables in Sololá's central market. 

Dominga has requested a loan with the purpose of purchasing a plot of land.  As she possesses an enterprising spirit, she has the goal of further expanding her business as a source of daily income.

loans.use: to purchase plot of land.

loans.name: Thamarai Self Help Group - Kovanur

texts.en:
Shanthi is from Kovanur village in Tamil Nadu. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a farmer. She has a firewood conventional stove in her kitchen that produces a lot of carbon dioxide. As a remedy for this situation, she intends to take a loan to buy a smokeless stove in her kitchen.  
Shanthi, along with nine other members who formed “Thamarai” Self Help Group, is requesting a loan to buy a smokeless stove. Shanthi is the featured borrower of this group.
 
These stoves are better than traditional stoves, as they cook faster and emit less smoke. The traditional stove emits a lot of smoke containing carbon dioxide, which affects both her and her children’s health with diseases like tract infection, lung diseases, and asthma. The smokeless stove is lightweight, produces less smoke and uses 65% less fuel than traditional stoves. They all hope to have a healthier life with this stove.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia  es soltera  y no tiene hijos  Ella vive en El Alto en una casa de adobe  que le pertenece a sus familiares Claudia es vivandera y quiere un credito para comprar viveres (arroz, aceite, etc) para su actividad comercial Claudia  es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Claudia is single and has no children. She lives in El Alto in an adobe house that belongs to her relatives. Claudia sells food provisions and wants a loan in order to buy foodstuffs (rice, oil, etc) for her business. Claudia provides the only source of income for her home, and this is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs (rice, oil, etc) for her business.

loans.name: Carlota Albertina

texts.es:
Carlota de 41 años de edad, una mujer emprendedora que día a día busca el bienestar de su familia. Tiene 8 años de ser empleada de una maquila del lugar de su residencia. Ella apesar de los obstáculos de la vida busca la manera de salir adelante junto a sus hijos. Hace varios años se divorcio de su compañero de vida, por tal razón ella ha tenido que sacar adelante a sus 4 hijos. 

Carlota se siente feliz, porque sus 2 primeros hijos ya son mayores de edad y le ayudan a la subsistencia del hogar. Actualmente tiene 2 pequeñitos por quienes trabaja muy arduamente de lunes a viernes desde muy temprano.

Carlota necesita el efectivo del crédito para comprar material para instalación de la luz en su casa, como cables, dados, poliducto, etc. y pagar a la persona que le instale la luz, ella quiere una mejor vida para sus hijos y es por eso busca que estén lo mas cómodos posibles, con una buena iluminación en su hogar.
texts.en:
Carlota is 41 years old. She is an enterprising woman who day after day looks after the well-being of her family. She has been working at an assembly plant near her house for 8 years. In spite of the obstacles in her life, she is looking for a way to get ahead together with her children. She divorced her life partner because she had to get her 4 children ahead.

Carlota feels happy because her first 2 children are already older and help her to keep the household going. Currently, she has 2 little ones for whom she works very hard from early morning Monday through Friday.

Carlota needs cash from the loan to purchase material for installing lighting in her house, like cables, wrenches, lines, etc. and to pay the person who installs the light. She wants a better life for her children, and it is for this reason that she is looking to make them as comfortable as possible, with good lighting in their home.

loans.use: to purchase materials for installing lights in her house, like cables, wrenches, lines, etc. and to pay the person who installs the light; she wants a better life for her children and because of this is looking to make them as comfortable as possible, with good lighting in their home.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
María tiene 71 años de edad, solo estudió hasta  segundo grado ya que en aquella época no existían muchas posibilidades para seguir estudiando por la situación económica, ella es viuda desde hace ocho años, procreó 10 hijos los cuales todos viven en hogares apartes, María solo vive con un nieto que estudia en la escuela y depende de ella.

María se dedica a la venta de enchiladas y pasteles en la cancha de fútbol de la comunidad, también lleva a vender refrescos y sandía, ya tiene 4 años realizando esta actividad productiva que ejerce los días domingos desde las 12:00 del mediodía hasta las 5:00 pm, en ocasiones una hija se involucra en el trabajo, María trabaja para sentirse bien consigo misma y para que no le falte nada a su nieto.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar más insumos para la venta de pasteles,  refrescos y enchiladas ya que se acerca un torneo de fútbol en la cancha donde ella vende y quiere aprovechar de vender bastante.


Su sueño es contar con buena salud para salir a vender y darle todo lo que ella pueda a su nieto para que se prepare académicamente.
texts.en:
María is 71 years old and only studied up to Grade 2 as at that time there were not many possibilities to continue to study due to the economic situation. She has been a widow for 8 years and has 10 children who live in their own homes. María lives with one grandchild who studies at school and is dependent on her.

María works selling enchiladas and pastries at a football stadium in her community. She also takes soft drinks to sell and watermelon. She has been in this business for 4 years working on Sunday from 12 noon until 5 pm. Sometimes a daughter helps her with the work. María works to feel good about herself and that her grandchild has all he needs.

She needs a loan to buy more supplies for a football tournament at the stadium where she sells. She wants to take advantage of this and sell a lot. Her dream is to hope for good health so that she go out and sell and provide her grandson with everything she can so he can prepare himself academically.

loans.use: to buy more supplies for the sale of pastries, soft drinks and enchiladas.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: El señor Andrés vive con sus dos hijos pequeños y su concubina la señora Benita, es agricultor dedicado a la producción de piña, plátano y otros cultivos en su parcela propia, vive en una casa alquilada y desde hace un tiempo atrás compro su lote urbano donde ahora quiere construir su pequeña vivienda es por ello que solicita un crédito para la construcción de su vivienda, de esta forma lograra cumplir su sueño de vivir en casa propia además sus hijos tendrán mayor espacio para poder jugar y podrán tener mayor libertad, en todo sentido se sentirán mucho más cómodos y tendrán mayores beneficios.
texts.en:
Sr. Andrés lives with his two small children and wife, Sra. Benita. He is a farmer devoted to the production of pineapples, bananas and other crops on his own parcel of land. He lives in a rented house. 

Some time ago Andrés bought an urban lot where he now wants to build a small dwelling. Consequently he is requesting a loan in order to build a house. In this way he will fulfill his dream of living in his own house. In addition, his children will have more space to play and they will have more freedom. In every way they will feel much more comfortable and have more benefits.

loans.use: to build a home for himself, his wife, and two children

loans.name: Valentine

texts.en: Valentine is 26 years old with a one-year-old child. Her business for the past year has been to sell sorghum. Her husband is a motorcyclist. With the loan, she would like to buy more sorghum for sale. The profit from the business will be reinvested in the same business.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs for sale.

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es:
Norma tiene 38 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, por la condición económica que se vivía en esa época era muy difícil seguir, está acompañada y su pareja está en el extranjero, ambos son los responsables de la manutención de sus 2 hijos que estudian en la escuela.

Norma se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida típica como yuca frita, pasteles, empanadas, etc. Cuenta con más de 5 años de dedicarse a esta actividad pues desde pequeña le gustó el comercio, también se dedica al comercio de ropa. La venta la realiza de casa en casa, ella hace un recorrido de dos kilómetros, toda la gente la conoce como una mujer que le gusta ganarse la vida honradamente. El horario desde que empieza con los preparativos es de 8:00 am y culmina con la venta a las 3:00 pm.   


El préstamo lo necesita para comprar ropa, ya que vienen las fiestas patronales de donde ella vive y es un buen momento para comercializar. El préstamo le ayudara a poder realizar su compra al por mayor  y con esto tener más mercadería para la demanda.

Los sueños de Norma son que aumentar las ventas para obtener mejores ingresos, con lo que podrá cubrir sus necesidades y las de su familia, que sus hijos puedan salir adelante con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Norma is 38 years old and studied up to Grade 9. At this time it was very difficult to continue due to the economic situation. She is married, her spouse is overseas. Both of them are responsible for the sustenance of their two children who study in school.

Norma works preparing and selling typical foods like fried yucca, pastries, empanadas etc. She has been doing this business for more than 5 years as since she was small she has enjoyed commerce. She also works selling clothing. She sells from house to house and she travels about two km. Everyone knows her as a woman who likes to gain her living honestly. She begins her preparations at 8 am and finishes her sales at 3 pm.

She needs the loan to buy clothing as the Saint day festivals where she lives are approaching and it is a good time to sell. The loan will help her buy wholesale and have more merchandise to meet the demand. Norma's dream is to increase her sales to make more money so she can pay for her needs and that of her family so that her children can continue with their studies.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Santa Catalina Group

texts.es:
Santa Catalina está en su 3er. ciclo  del programa de comité, donde también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza como un medio de poder crecer y salir adelante.
Edith integra este grupo, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que debe esforzarse un poco más para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ella se encarga de la venta de helados en su casa, tiene su negocio en el cual vende todo tipo de helados de sabores variados. Ya tiene una buena clientela que siempre compra de ella.
La Sra. con este préstamo comprara nuevos insumos para su heladería, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Santa Catalina is in her 3rd cycle of the communal bank program, where members are also completing surveys to help eliminate poverty as a way to grow and get ahead.

Edith, a member of this group, showed a level one of poverty in her latest survey, which means that she needs to make a bit more of an effort to be able to improve her living conditions. She works selling ice creams from home, she has her own business in which she sells all types of ice creams of different flavors. She already has good customers who always buy from her.

This lady, with this loan will purchase new supplies for her ice cream store, which will help her to concrete her business plan, and will help her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy supplies for an ice cream store.

loans.name: María Fidelina

texts.es:
María tiene 45 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado, las escuelas quedaban demasiado lejos por lo tanto no pudo continuar, y se dedicó a los quehaceres del hogar, está casada poro su pareja está en el extranjero, vive con sus dos hijas, un yerno y un nieto.

María se dedica a los oficios de la casa, además tiene ganado y ordeña dos vacas, también paga mano de obra para cultivar maíz, estas actividades las aprendió de su padre, su yerno se involucra en los trabajos y sus hijas la apoyan con ayuda económica.  


El préstamo es invertido para comprar una novilla y tener más ganado y de esta forma seguir trabajando en lo que le genera ganancias para el hogar.

Ella espera mantenerse siempre ocupada ya que le ayuda a estar saludable, también espera cuidar lo que tanto ha trabajado para algún día dejarles una herencia a sus hijas.
texts.en:
María is 45 years old. She studied through second grade. The schools were too far away, so she couldn't continue, and she worked at the household chores instead. She is married and her husband is outside of the country. She lives with her two daughters, a son-in-law, and a grandson.

María works as a homemaker. She also has cattle and milks two cows. She also pays for labor to farm corn. She learned these activities from her father. Her son-in-law helps out with this work and her daughters help her economically.

The loan is to buy a heifer so she can have more cattle so that she can continue working in that which generates income for the household.

She hopes to always stay busy because this helps her to stay healthy. She also hopes to take good care of what she's worked so hard for so that one day she can leave her daughters an inheritance.

loans.use: to buy a heifer so she can have more cattle.

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
En Suchitepequez, una de las ventas de productos de consumo diario más visitado es la de Luz María de 47  y madre de dos hijos.  Es muy visitado porque no tiene otros negocios que le hagan competencia.

Pero ella no se conforma con eso, sino que piensa ampliar su negocio y surtirlo con más producto, y con el tiempo colocar otro negocio en el mercado municipal de la ciudad.

Es la razón que Luz María ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de productos para abastecer abundantemente su negocio actual y aprovechar la ausencia de competencia. 

Y así asegurar un futuro mejor para sus hijos.
texts.en:
In Suchitepequez, one of the most often visited places selling everyday consumer products is that of Luz Maria, 47 years old, the mother of two children.  Her store is very popular because no other business  competes with it.  But Luz Maria is not content with this but rather thinks of broadening her business and stocking more products, and in time placing another business in the city market.

This is why Luz Maria has asked for a loan to buy products to abundantly supply her current business and take advantage of the absence of competition.
Thus she will assure a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy everyday consumer products as merchandise

loans.name: San Ramon Group

texts.es:
San Ramón está en su 2° ciclo, también están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, ya que a través de él podrán conocer la situación de cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
Rebeca, una de ellas, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas variadas y frescas, que día a día trae ara poder ofrecer a sus clientes. Comenta que por medio de su trabajo ayuda y mantiene a su familia, para una vida digna. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas frescas, que le permitirá poder seguir con su trabajo de ventas varias.
texts.en:
San Ramon group is in its 2nd cycle, it is also in a poverty elimination program, through which they can know about each member's situation and work accordingly.

Rebeca, one of them, she works selling a variety of fruits and sweets, and from day to day she tries in order to provide to her customers. She says that through her work she is able to sustain her family and live a decent life. 

She is requesting this loan to be able to buy fresh fruit, which will allow her to continue her work doing various kinds of sales.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruit for sale.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael, un hombre de 62 años de edad. Vive junto a sus 2 hijas y su esposa, él a lo largo del tiempo ha tratado de sacar adelante a sus hijas. Tiene una pequeña de 14 años quien sufre una enfermedad, la pequeña no camina. 

 Rafael con el dinero del crédito comprará una microbus, pues él transporta cada semana a su pequeña a el hospital y necesita que su pequeña vaya mas cómoda. 

Él da gracias a Dios que tiene hijos en el exterior que le ayudan económicamente, ademas de eso cuando le sale trabajo en su lugar de residencia no duda en hacerlo, pues él desea de todo corazón que su niña mejore.

A pesar de las circunstancias de la vida, Rafael no pierde la esperanza que un día va a ver a su niña mejor y que la vera sonreír y correr al igual que su otra pequeña.
texts.en:
Rafael, a 62 year old man, lives with his two daughters and wife. Over time, he has tried to help his daughters get ahead. One of them is 14 years old and suffers an illness. She is unable to walk.

He will purchase a minibus with money from the loan because he takes his young daughter to the hospital each week and he needs his young one to travel more comfortably.

He thanks God that he has sons living abroad who help him financially. Beside that whenever he finds work near his residence, he does not hesitate to take it since he wholeheartedly wants his little girl to get better.

Despite his life circumstances, Rafael does not lose hope that one day he will see his child get better and that he will see her smile and run the same as his other young daughter.

loans.use: to buy a minibus to takes his child to the hospital every week so that she can travel more comfortably.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité se denomina Mujeres Unidas  es un grupo antiguo con 18 integrantes, todas con muy buenas expectativas sobre las actividades que van a realizar.
Una de las integrantes que se caracteriza por ser  muy emprendedora es la Sra. Florencia quien tiene  una despensa donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad y otras que sus clientes pueda necesitar, además ella vende en su negocio toda su producción como queso, mandioca, verduras y otros productos. Ella es una mujer muy sacrificada y luchadora, que quiere salir adelante y ayudar a su familia y seres queridos por medio de su trabajo.
Pide este préstamo para poder surtir su despensa con todo tipo de productos, como ser verduras, carne, frutas, panificados, lácteos, y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Mujeres Unidas [Women United], it is an old group with 18 members, all with very good expectations of the work they are going to do.

One of the members known for being very enterprising is Florencia who has a store where she offers basic products and more that her customers may need, furthermore she sells all her products like cheese, cassava, vegetables and other products. She is a woman who sacrifices and struggles, and wants to get ahead and help her family and loved ones through her work.

She is requesting a loan to be able to stock her store with all types of products, such as vegetables, meat, fruit, baked goods, milk products and more, this way she will be able to continue working as she always has done. She is thankful for the opportunity she will receive, it will be a great help.

loans.use: purchase vegetables, meat, fruit, bread, milk, and more to stock her store.

loans.name: Alecia

texts.es: Alecia  esta casada y  tiene dos hijos  Ella vive en la comunidad de Ajllata en una casa de adobe Alecia sobrevive como productora de leche y necesita un credito para comprar una vaca lechera que le permita incrementar su produccion Su esposo trabaja como ayudante de albañil pero tiene que trasladarse a otras comunidades para trabajar por eso, se podria decir que Alecia esta sola en el negocio de la leche y necesita su colaboracion para hacerlo crecer
texts.en: Alecia is married and she has two children. She lives in the community of Ajllata, in an adobe house. Alecia makes a living as a dairy farmer, and she needs a loan in order to purchase a dairy cow, which will allow her to increase her production.  Her husband works as a bricklayer’s assistant, but he has to travel to other communities in order to work. That is why one could say that Alicia is alone in the milk business; and she needs your help to make it grow.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow, which will allow her to increase her production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to aid her coffee plants

loans.name: Melany De Jesús

texts.es:
Melany tiene 48 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado ya que eran escasas las escuelas en la zona donde ella vivía en esa época, está casada y su esposo se dedica al comercio de productos desechables en las unidades de buses que transitan en la zona, ambos son los responsable de la manutención de sus 4 hijos que están estudiando en diferentes niveles académicos.


Ella vende en el mercado productos como helados, refrescos y licuados, está en un punto céntrico donde circula bastante gente, tiene 7 años de dedicarse al negocio,  decidió iniciar este negocio pues nadie más vendía esos productos en el lugar y quiso aprovechar la oportunidad, anteriormente le ayudaba a una tía a vender ropa. La distancia que recorre es de un kilómetro diario, solo ella es la que realiza esta actividad, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 am a 3 pm. 


El préstamo lo necesita para pagar la mensualidad de los estudios de su hijo que va a la universidad, con esto su hijo podrá iniciar otro ciclo de clases, ya que mientras no se cancele no puede iniciar.


Ella sueña seguir adelante con la venta en el mercado, cubrir las necesidades de su familia, también que sus hijos se preparen para que sean alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
Melany is 48 years old. She studied through third grade. There weren't many schools in the area where she lived during that time. She is married and her husband sells disposable products on the buses that have routes in the area. They are both responsible for providing for their 4 children, who are studying in different academic levels.

She sells products such as icecreams, soft drinks, and smoothies in the market. She decided to start this business because no one else sold these products there and she wanted to take advantage of the opportunity. She used to help an aunt sell clothing. The distance that she travels to work every day is one kilometer. She is the only one who works in the business. Her work schedule is from 7:00 am until 3:00 pm. 

She needs the loan to pay the monthly tuition for her son who goes to the university. With this, her son could start another cycle of clases. He can't start until he pays.

She dreams of getting ahead with her sales in the market and covering her family's basic needs. Also, that her children will study so that they can be someone in life.

loans.use: to pay the monthly tuition for her son who goes to the university.

loans.name: Cate

texts.en:
Cate is a 48-year-old divorced mother of two children, both attending different schools. She owns a stationary shop in Kyotera town and she works 6 days a week and 12 hours a day. She has been in the business since 2006 due to the fact that it required less capital than farming, it was her area of expertise and she had a passion for books.

She is also a farmer who grows beans, matooke and maize for sale, from which she gains additional income to support her family. She hopes to use the loan to buy more paper and other office and school supplies to stock her stationary business. She usually sells products to people around Kyotera and neighboring areas.

Her hopes and dreams are to expand her business so that she can open up branches in other areas. However, she faces a challenge of the lack of enough capital and some clients who take goods on credit and fail to pay back on time. She is an honest and hardworking woman in business.

loans.use: To buy reams of paper and box files among other stationary items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough fish to sell

loans.name: Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Mercedes está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de  Curuguaty, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Alicia  es una de las integrantes, ella tiene su pequeño negocio de  Despensa, donde trabaja, y desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de la ayuda de todas las personas de su zona puedan ir mejorando su entorno y así ofrecer una mayor seguridad a sus familias, también poder procurar para ellos un mejor futuro.
Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de productos varios para su despensa, para surtirlo y que de esa forma pueda seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
The Las Mercedes group is in it's first cycle of the women's group program, it is in the city of Curuguaty, which is an area a little far from the central zone and is still experiencing growth. It is an area that is difficult to access, so the members of the group want to struggle to grow and give the area where they live a better atmosphere and they will keep growing slowly.

Alicia is one of the members, she has a small store business where she works, and hopes that as time passes, through the help of everyone in her area  their environment may improve and thus provide greater security for their families, also to ensure a better future for them.

She is requesting a loan to buy various products for her store, to stock it and thus be able to continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy various supplies for her store.

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 27 years old with two children between one and five years old. One of her children goes to school. Her business, together with her husband, is to sell foodstuffs, which they have been doing for the past four years. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans and sorghum for sale. The profit from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs such as beans and sorghum to sell

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey lives in Hoima, Uganda. He is a married, hardworking man age 51 with 10 children. He sells and buys maize. He started his business to increase his income. He desires to buy a personal car to make it easier to supply products to his customers. He will use the money to buy more maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: tobuy more products to sell. Among the items she'll buy are: flats of bottled water, boxes of sodas, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Jean Baptiste

texts.en: Jean Baptiste is 34 years old. He has four children between the ages of 1 and 12 years old; three of them go to school. He runs a business together with his wife. They sell foodstuffs and mineral waters. With this loan, he would like to buy more foodstuffs to sell. The profit from the business will be used to add new items for sale which he thinks his clientele would love to enjoy, such as cooking oil and lotions.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs and mineral waters to sell

loans.name: Yaneth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yaneth se desempeña como empleada en un negocio de comidas básicamente un restaurante, pero como los recursos que generaba no eran suficientes para ayudar en su hogar decidió solicitar un crédito. 

El crédito lo invertirá para iniciar un negocio de cría de pollos por lo que comenzara con un galpón y unos pollos.

Con la ayuda de este crédito podrá lograr un ingreso más en su hogar pues sus padres depende de ella en su totalidad y quiere darle a sus familiares una buena vida con más comodidades, con mejor alimentación y tener recursos para la compra de drogas que llegase a necesitar. 

Su gran sueño es tener el negocio de cría de pollos más grande en el sector.
texts.en:
Yaneth works as an employee at a food business, which is basically a restaurant. However, the income she earns is not sufficient to help at home. For this reason, she decided to request a loan.

The money will be invested in order to start a business of raising chickens. She will start out with a chicken coop and a few chickens. With the help of this loan, Yaneth will be able to generate more income since her parents are totally dependent on her. She also wants to provide her family members a good life that includes more amenities, a better diet, and enough money to buy needed medicines.

Her greatest wish is to have the largest poultry business in the area.

loans.use: to buy a shelter and a few chickens in order to start a poultry business.

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en: Jackson is acquiring a loan to buy more maize to sell. He is 45 years old, lives in Hoima, Uganda and also does farming. He desires to build a residential house. His major challenge is price fluctuation and seasonal changes.

loans.use: to buy more maize to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more goods such as fish, pig's feet, and rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more oil and rice to sell

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina tiene 60 años de edad,  nunca asistió a la escuela porque estaban muy lejos, es madre soltera de 7 hijos por los que luchó sola para salir adelante, en casa solo vive un hijo suyo y un nieto.  


Ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos, es quien administra todos los bienes que ha logrado conseguir con su trabajo, además tiene ganado y ordeña dos vacas,  también tiene cerdos y cultiva maíz que utiliza para consumo, el trabajo lo aprendió por medio de sus padres, quienes le inculcaron valores muy importantes, no tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, la parcela en la que trabaja sus cultivos está a un kilómetro de su casa, por lo que el recorrido lo hace a pie, su hijo se involucra en todos los trabajos que Marcelina realiza.


El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar un toro para ampliar más su ganadería. 

Sus sueños son trabajar siempre para que no falten ingresos al hogar, espera que sus hijos sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 60 years old. She never attended school because it was very far away. She is a single mother of 7 children, for whom she strives to get ahead. Only one of her children and a grandson live with her.  

She makes a living in domestic work, and is the one who manages all of the assets that she has succeeded in acquiring with her business. In addition, she has livestock and milks two cows. She also has pigs, and farms maize that she uses for consumption. She learned this work from her parents, who taught her very important values. These are all the activities that she is engaged in. 

The parcel of land upon which she grows her crops is a kilometre from her house, and she makes the trip there and back on foot. Her son is involved in all of Marcelina's work as well.

The solicited loan is needed to buy a bull in order to further expand her livestock. 

Her dreams are to always work so that her home never lacks an income, and she hopes that her children do well.

loans.use: to buy a bull to further expand her livestock.

loans.name: Josepha

texts.en: Josepha is 30 years old with three children between 5 and 10 years old, all of whom go to school. Her business, together with her husband, is selling foodstuffs. With the loan, they would like to buy more beans and sorghum for sale. The profits from the business will be used to renovate their house.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs such as beans and sorghum to sell

loans.name: Kuña Yoayu Kuera Group

texts.es:
Este grupo lleva por nombre “Kuña Yoayu kuera” que quiere decir unión de mujeres, ya que eso es, una unión de mujeres que quieren progresar y crecer por medio del trabajo en equipo de todas.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Liz quien se dedica al trabajo de cotillón, ella elabora centros de mesas, regaleros, adornos para tortas con diversos personajes también se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones que de alguna manera exigen y al mismo tiempo incentivan a las mujeres a luchar para poder superar la pobreza.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de isopor, cintas, adornos variados, entre otros; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a seguir mejorando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This group goes by the name “Kuña Yoayu Kuera," which means union of women, since that's what it is. It is a union of women who want to progress and grow in their work, as a team of everyone.

One of the women is Liz, who works in parties and events. She makes centerpieces, party setups, and cake decorations of a variety of characters. She also does the work of the consultants, who do ongoing monitoring of training and certifications that are needed, and at the same time, encourage the women to fight to rise above poverty.

The woman is requesting this loan to purchase styrofoam, ribbons, various decorations, etc. These will help her work her business plan, which will help her continue improving her revenues.

loans.use: to purchase styrofoam, ribbons, various decorations, etc.

loans.name: Darwin Javier

texts.es:
Darwin tiene 39 años de edad de estado civil soltero vive con sus padres en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

El se dedica a la fabricacion de flores artificiales. Solicita el crédito para capital de trabajo para asi fomentar el negocio. La compra lo realiza en Ventanas. Su meta es tener una casa propia. Su desafío es la competencia y las enfermedades. En su tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Darwin is 39 years old and single, he lives with his parents in the Ventanas canton in the Los Rios province. He works making artificial flowers. 

He is requesting a loan for working capital and to thus develop his business. He will make the purchases in Ventanas. His goal is to have his own home. His challenges are competition and illness. In his free time he likes to listen to music and play sport.

loans.use: to obtain working capital.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 67 años de edad, no pudo continuar estudiando debido a los escasos recursos económicos, por lo que mejor decidió empezar a trabajar en la agricultura, actualmente está casado y su esposa se dedica al trabajo doméstico, ellos tienen 2 hijos pero hace 3 años viajaron a los Estados Unidos. 


Francisco tiene 50 años de experiencia en el trabajo agrícola, él aprendió este trabajo gracias a sus padres que se lo enseñaron cuando estaba pequeño. Aparte de este trabajo él se dedica a la elaboración de hamacas y a la albañilería, 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas para la milpa, ya que a futuro desea darle un buen manejo para poder tener mejores rendimientos de la cosecha.

Su sueño es tener granos básicos que le permitan satisfacer las necesidades alimenticias de su familia.
texts.en:
Franciso is 67 years old, he couldn't continue to go to school due to scant financial resources, so he decided it was best to work in farming, he is married and his wife does domestic work, they have 2 children but 3 years ago they moved to the United States.

Francisco has 50 years experience in farming, he learnt this trade thanks to his parents who taught him when he was young. Apart from this work, he works making hammocks and bricklaying.

He needs the loan to buy farm supplies for the cornfield, since he wants to handle things well to have better crop yields in the future.

His dream is to have the staple grains to allow him the meet the nutritional needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for his cornfield to have better harvests.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Francisco está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante.-
La Sra. Maria, una de las integrantes del grupo se dedica a la cría, venta o faena de animales de corral, que ella misma cría y que por medio de su humilde trabajo da a su familia lo que necesitan para una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Por medio  de este préstamo quiere comprar mas animales de granja  para su cría, como ser gallinas y cerdos, para que de esa manera pueda aumentar más su clientela y también pueda generar más ingresos en la familia, gracias al apoyo constante que le brinda la institución está pudiendo realizar varios proyectos.-
texts.en:
The San Franciso Group is in its fourth loan cycle with the women's program, where all the women are working and helping each other to get ahead.

Maria, one of the members of the group, works raising and selling barn animals. Through her humble work, she gives her family what they need for a dignified life without privations.

With this loan, she wants to purchase more farm animals to raise, such as chickens and pigs. In this way, she will be able to grow her clientele and also generate more income for the family. Thanks to the constant support that this institution provides, she is able to do a variety of projects.

loans.use: to purchase animals such as chickens and pigs for raising.

loans.name: Judith Cristina

texts.es:
Judith tiene 27 años de edad de estado civil soltera vive con su hijo de 6 años en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, y al engorde de cerdos. Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas. La compra lo realiza en Ventanas. Su meta es tener un buen negocio y una casa . Su desafío es las plagas. En su tiempo libre le gusta cocinar.
texts.en:
Judith is 27 years old and is single, she lives with her 6 year old son in the Ventanas canton of Los Rios province. She works farming growing corn and fattening pigs. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase farming supplies. She will make the purchase in Ventanas. Her goal is to have a good business and a house. 

Her challenges are pests. In her free time she likes to cook.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel, esta soltero no tiene hijos vive en casa de sus padres en la ciudad de La Paz.

Actualmente trabaja en el Ministerio de Metereologia donde percibe un sueldo mínimo, el credito que solicita es para refaccionar su habitacion resulta que el tumbado se esta cayendo y la pared esta descascarándose o presentando rajaduras lo que gana actualmente apenas le alcanza para vivir, por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Israel is single, he has no children, he lives with his parents in the city of La Paz.

He currently works for the Ministry of Meteorology where he earns a minimal salary. The loan he is requesting is to renovate his room, as the ceiling is falling down and the walls are peeling and showing cracks.

At the moment, he barely earns enough to live, so he needs your help.

loans.use: to renovate his room, as the ceiling is falling down and the walls are peeling and showing cracks.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro es casado y tiene 6 hijos Vive en la ciudad de El Alto en una casa de adobe que le pertenece a sus familiares Genaro es empleado en una fábrica y necesita un prestamo para comprar material de construccion (calamina, cemento, estuco) para poder arreglar una habitacion de su hogar Genaro es la unica fuente de ingresoe en su hogar, por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Genaro is married and has 6 children. He lives in El Alto city, in a clay house that belongs to his relatives. He is a worker at a factory and needs a loan to buy building materials (corrugated iron, cement, stucco) to fix a room of his home.

Genaro is the sole source of income of his house, that’s why he needs the help.

loans.use: to buy building materials (corrugated iron, cement, stucco) to fix a room of his home.

loans.name: Julio César

texts.es:
Julio de 64 años de edad, no obtuvo estudios académicos, solo aprendió a firmar, ahora está soltero pero tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo dos viven con él y son independientes.
 

Julio es agricultor, trabajo que aprendió desde muy pequeño ya que sus padres se dedicaban a realizar esta misma labor, él cultiva una hectárea de maíz ya que esta es la única fuente de ingresos que posee, el lugar donde él cultiva está a una distancia de   25 minutos de su casa y se va a pie.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar insecticidas y fertilizantes para aplicar a sus cultivos y obtener una buena producción de granos básicos y  así tener la seguridad alimentaria para su familia.


Su objetivo es obtener una buena cosecha para su alimentación y para vender.
texts.en:
Julio is 64-years old.  He never went to school and only learned to write his name.  He is single now, but he had five children, two of whom live with him but are independent. 

Julio is a farmer.  He learned the work at a very young age, as his parents made their living with the same labor.  Julio plants a hectare of corn, and that is his only source of income.  The area he plants is about 25 minutes from his house, and he gets there on foot. 

Julio needs the loan to purchase insecticides and fertilizers to apply to his crop.  This will yield a better production of basic grains and ensure his ability to feed his family. 

Julio's goal is to have a good harvest for his own food supply and to sell.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides and fertilizers to apply to his crop so he can get a better production of basic grains, which will ensure his ability to feed his family.

loans.name: Paz Del Carmen

texts.es:
Paz tiene 35 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado de nivel académico, no pudo continuar ya que sus padres no tenías las condiciones económicas para apoyarla, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica al comercio, tiene 3 hijos los cuales dos de ellos están en la escuela y el otro aún no, sus hijos son los únicos que dependen de ella.


Paz se dedica a trabajar en un molino, ya tiene tres años de estar ayudándole a su hermana en esta trabajo, además Paz tiene un pequeña tienda aprovechando de vender cuando las personas llegan al molino, fue la necesidad la que la llevó a emprender este negocio y debido a que los habitantes de la comunidad necesitaba una tienda cercana.


El crédito solicitado lo ocupará para comprar fajas al molino que ya se le arruinaron, Paz lo administra cuando su hermana viaja por lo tanto esto le ayudará mucho ya que tendrá el molino en buenas condiciones y seguirá obteniendo ingresos para su familia.

Los sueños de Paz son tener una tienda más fuerte y un molino propio ya que en la comunidad se va poblando de más personas que necesitan de este servicio.
texts.en:
Paz is 35 years old, she studied up to ninth grade at school, she couldn't continue to go to school as her parents did not have the financial resources to support her, she has a partner who works in trade, she has 3 children, two of them are in school and the other one not yet, her children are her only dependents.

Paz works in a cornfield, she has been helping her sister in this work for three years, also Paz has a small store, selling to people who come to the corn mill, she started this business out of the need, as the residents of the community needed a store nearby.

The loan she is requesting is to buy belts for her mill as they have worn out, Paz operates it when her sister goes on a trip and this will help her a lot to have the mill in good condition and to keep making an income for the family.

The dreams that Paz has are to have a stronger store and her own mill as in the community the number of people who need these services are increasing.

loans.use: to buy belts for her corn mill as they are ruined.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice and soap to sell.

loans.name: Paulia

texts.en: Paulia is a 43 year old married woman with seven children. She has a small plantation business where she sells to the members of her community and also to the public in town. She has just joined the SPBD program in order to gain access to financial assistance so she would be able to improve her plantation and enable it to be in a better condition for the crops to be sold. With this money, she would purchase chemicals, bush knives, blade sharpeners, and a wheelbarrow for her plantation business. Paulia hopes to improve the living conditions of her family from the profits she is able to earn from her business.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals, bush knives, blade sharpeners, and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase potatoes

loans.name: Ysapy Group

texts.es:
El grupo Ysapy está en su ciclo 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, luchando por mejorar.
Integra este grupo la Sra. Rosalina, quien es vendedora de comidas, ella misma hace los alimentos que prepara y luego los vende de manera ambulante. Se hizo ya de una clientela bien variada que siempre compra sus comidas, y que con ello puede dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para ir mejorando.
Quiere seguir creciendo, es por eso que pide este préstamo, para que por medio de ello pueda comprar verduras, carne, condimentos, hortalizas y demás, ya que así podrá seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The Ysapy group is in its second cycle of the women's committee program, where all the women work and help each other to get ahead. They are doing a poverty elimination survey, where they find themselves below the poverty line, fighting to improve.

A member of this group is Rosalina, who is a food-seller. She makes the meals herself, which she prepares and then sells in a traveling manner. She has already gotten herself a varied clientele who always buys her food. With this, she is able to give her family all they need to go on getting better.

She wants to continue growing, which is why she is requesting this loan. With it, she will be able to purchase greens, meat, condiments, vegetables, etc. so that she can continue with her work, as she has been doing.

loans.use: to purchase greens, meat, condiments, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Flor Alba

texts.es: Flor es una señora muy trabajadora, ella es madre soltera tiene 3 hijas de 13, 19 y 26 años y un hijo  de 16 años, de los cuales 4 están estudiando, Flor paga arriendo por una casa en la que vive junto a sus hijas, Flor se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y trabaja al jornal, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para criarlos en un pequeño lotecito que hay en donde ella vive, de este negocio y de su trabajo ella aspira salir adelante junto a sus hijas y seguirlas educando.
texts.en: Flor is a very hardworking woman.  She is a single mother with 3 daughters aged 13, 19 and 26, and a 16 year-old son.  Four of her children are in school.  Flor rents the house where she lives with her daughters.  Flor has a business raising small animals, and she also does day work.  She will use this loan to buy chickens to raise on a small lot where she lives.  From this business and her other work, she aspires to get ahead with her daughters and continue to educate them.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Lourdes Amparo

texts.es:
Lourdes tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, vive con sus 3 hijos de 20, 16 y 13 años en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Ella se dedica, a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz  Solicita el crédito para la compra de abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, urea, fungicida con la finalidad de mejorar la producción de sus cultivos. La compra lo realiza en Ventanas. Su meta es mejorar la producción de sus cultivos. Su desafío es el transporte. En su tiempo libre le gusta ver las noticias y viajar.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 40 years old. She is single, and lives with her three children ages 20, 16, and 13 in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

Lourdes works in agriculture by planting corn. She is requesting a loan to buy compost, insecticide, fertilizer, urea, and fungicide with the intent to improve the production of her crops. She buys the materials in Ventanas. Her goal is to increase the production of her crops, and her challenge is the transport. 

In her free time she likes to watch the news and travel.

loans.use: to buy what is needed to plant corn.

loans.name: Lekiana

texts.en: Lekiana is a 42 year old married woman with one child. She wants to start an elei printing business, selling to the members of her community and also to the members of the public in town. Her husband will help her out and that is why she has decided to just join the SPBD program, to gain access to financial assistance. She hopes to use this money to purchase rubber, fabric paints, brushes and rolls, and fabric materials for her elei printing business. Lekiana hopes to earn a lot of profit from her business and will save some of it, and she will reinvest the rest on her business so that it would be a continuous entity.

loans.use: to purchase rubber, fabric paints, brushes and rolls, and fabric.

loans.name: Malama

texts.en:
Malama is a 47-year-old married woman with eight children. She runs a small fishing business and is assisted by her husband and her children. 

She has been a member of the South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) program for more than six years to gain access to financial assistance. She plans to use this money to purchase a new freezer and two fishing canoes to better improve her fishing business. 

Malama has managed to help out with meeting her family's weekly financial obligations with the income she has been earning from her business and hopes to continue to improve on it.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer and two fishing canoes

loans.name: Koe Pyahu Group

texts.es:
El grupo Koe Pyahu está en su ciclo número 11º  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Nilse, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir un nivel medio, donde ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de las ventas que hace en su despensa, está luchando por mejorar.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de sus productos ya sea yerbas, productos de la canasta familiar, panificados entre otros, lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Koe Pyahu group is in its 11th cycle of the women's committee program, where all the women work and help each other to get ahead. They are doing the poverty elimination survey.

One of the members is Nilse, who, when last surveyed, demonstrated a level-two poverty. That is to say, medium-level poverty. Through her effort and continued work, and through sales that she makes from her store, she is fighting to get better.

The woman is requesting this loan to purchase her products, such as herbs, household items, breads, etc. This will help her carry out her business plan, which will help her improve her revenues.

loans.use: to purchase herbs, household items, breads, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough cartons of fish to sell.

loans.name: María Tomasa

texts.es:
María tiene 32 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, está acompañada y tiene 2 hijos, uno de 12 años que estudia 6 grado y una niña de 10 años, solo sus 2 hijos dependen directamente de ella, su pareja se encuentra fuera del país.


María desde muy pequeña se ha dedicado al comercio de mariscos ya que esta ha sido la fuente de ingresos para toda su familia, ella vive cerca de la playa lo que le permite obtener mariscos a muy buen precio y  de buena calidad, un hermano le ayuda a realizar las ventas ya que él maneja el vehículo que María posee.

El crédito será utilizado para comprar un motor para lancha y para comprar redes, ya que se quiere dedicar a la pesca. 

El principal sueño de María es mejorar el negocio para salir adelante con los compromisos que adquirió, brindarle la mejor educación a sus hijos y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is 32-years old.  She went to school until 4th grade.  She is married and has two children.  Her 12-year old son is in 6th grade, and she has a 10-year old daughter.  Her two children are the only ones who depend directly on her.  María's husband is out of the country.

From a very young age, María has made her living selling shellfish.  That has been the source of income for her whole family.  María lives near the beach, which allows her to get high quality shellfish at a very good price.  A brother helps her with the sales by driving María's vehicle. 

The loan will be used to purchase a motor for a boat and nets, as María wants to earn her living fishing. 

María's main goals are to improve her business so she can get ahead with the agreements she has made, to provide her children with the best education and to make improvements to her dwelling.

loans.use: to purchase a motor for a boat and nets, as she wants to start earning her living fishing.

loans.name: Senaira Del Carmen

texts.es:
En un país donde el precio de la canasta básica es más alto que el salario mínimo, una familia con más de un hijo no puede cumplir todas sus necesidades, pero mujeres como Jenaira  de 27 años y con dos hijos, buscan la manera de salir adelante para reforzar la economía familiar. Ha sido una joven emprendedora y con visión de futuro, hace tres años inició en el negocio de la venta de  joyería, con el objetivo de apoyar a su esposo, puesto que no contaba con un trabajo estable. La unión hizo la fuerza y juntos han logrado superar varios obstáculos y  han podido salir adelante. 
Jenaira solicita el crédito para incrementar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar joyería de acero y plata. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que cada vez tiene que hacer pedidos mayores para satisfacer la demanda, lo que le brinda la oportunidad de obtener mejores ingresos. Su ideal es proporcionarles a sus hijos educación y salud de calidad para que estos puedan tener un futuro prospero. Uno de sus planes futuros es establecer una pequeña tienda en su casa, asegura que trabajara arduamente hasta lograrlo.
texts.en:
In a country where the price of staple goods is higher than the minimum wage, a family with more than one kid cannot meet all its necessities; however, women like Jenaira, 27 years old and with two children, look for ways to get ahead to strengthen their family’s economy. 

She has been a young entrepreneur and with a vision for the future. Three years ago she opened a business selling jewelry, with the objective of supporting her husband because he did not have a stable job. The union gave them strength and together they have managed to overcome several obstacles, and they have been able to get ahead. 

Jenaira is requesting a loan to increase the production of her capital, she needs to purchase steel and silver jewelry. She relies on the funding because every time she has to make bigger orders in order to meet the demand, which brings the opportunity to have better earnings. Her ideal is to give her children an education and quality health so that they can have a prosperous future. One of her future plans is to establish a small store in her house. She says she will work hard until achieving it.

loans.use: to purchase silver and steel jewelry

loans.name: Jose Jaime

texts.es:
José es un experimentado y habilidoso maestro de obra habitante del municipio de Sonsón. Es un hombre muy reconocido por su responsabilidad y buena calidad de trabajo.

El ser maestro de obra le ha permitido conocer muchas personas y tener muchos conocimientos. Con este trabajo intenta conseguir el sustento para su familia compuesta por su esposa y dos hijos de 1 y 10 años.

El solicita un préstamo para la compra de un compresor de aire, herramienta que se utiliza para pintura y limpieza en las obras de construcción.

Con el crédito podrá continuar trabajando y mejorara la prestación de su servicio haciendo que sus clientes lo reconozcan y le den mejores contratos.

Es un hombre trabajador y muy simpático que siempre hace todo en bien de su familia.
texts.en:
José is an experienced and skilled master builder, an inhabitant of the community of Sonsón. He is a very well known man because of his sense of responsibility and the good quality of his work.

Being a master builder has allowed him to know many people and to have many acquaintances. With this work, he tries to obtain sustenance for his family, which is composed of his wife and two children, ages 1 and 10.

He is applying for a loan to purchase an air compressor, a tool that is used for painting and cleaning in construction work.

With the loan, he will be able to continue working, and he will improve the services he provides, causing his customers to recognize him and give him better contracts.

He is a hard-working and very congenial man who always does everything for the benefit of his family.

loans.use: to buy a compressor.

loans.name: Tapaau

texts.en:
Tapaau is a 42-year-old woman with three children. She operates a taxi business for which her partner is the driver. 

This is her second year with the South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) program and has found it quite helpful for her in times of need. The reason why she joined the SPBD program in the beginning was in order to gain access to financial assistance. 

She plans to use this money to purchase new tires, mirrors, and paint to repaint her taxi. Tapaau is hoping to have a lot of savings from the business profits so that she will be able to improve her business and improve their living standards.

loans.use: to purchase new tires, mirrors, and paint

loans.name: Arieta

texts.en:
Arieta is 33 years old and has five children. She runs a small fishing business along with her partner of ten years.

Arieta has just joined the SPBD program in order to gain access to a loan of 1,000 WST. She plans to use this money to buy fishing nets, goggles, fishing boots, a spear and torch lights to further improve her business.

Arieta hopes to save a lot of her profits from her business so that she can continue to provide a good living for her family and meet their financial obligations. This includes paying for her children's education, which is a special priority of hers.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear to upgrade her business.

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania, 52, is married and has six children. She runs a small general store in her village.

Epifania has been with the SPBD program for more than three years now. She is receiving a 2,000 WST loan to buy sugar, rice, flour, salt, soft drinks, snacks, etc. to restock her shop. She sees herself continuing to run a profitable store so that she can make improvements in her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her shop.

loans.name: Tiene

texts.en:
Tiene is 51 years old and married with two children. For the past two years she has run her small store where she sells a variety of items.

Tiene became a member of SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital for her business. She is applying for a 1,500 WST loan to buy a new display fridge, a chest freezer, snacks, frozen goods, canned food and sacks of onions and potatoes.

Tiene hopes to use her profits to pay for the renovation of her house and help pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a new display fridge, a chest freezer, and various foods to sell.

loans.name: Kirisitina

texts.en: Kirisitina is a 32-year-old woman with 3 children. She runs a small plantation business not only growing taro, bananas, yam, but also vegetables which she sells to the members of her community and also to members of the public. She has just joined the SPBD program to gain access to financial assistance. She plans to use this money to purchase chemicals, fertilizers, a mist blower, vegetable seeds, taro roots, bush knives, and a blade sharpener for further improvement of her plantation business. Kirisitina hopes to make a lot of profit from her business so that she will be able to provide a better living and also to meet their weekly essential needs.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals, fertilizers, a mist blower, vegetable seeds, taro roots, bush knives, and a blade sharpener.

loans.name: Peka

texts.en: Peka is a 26-year-old woman with 2 children. She wants to start a business selling pancakes to the members of her community. She has just joined the SPBD program in order to gain access to financial assistance. She plans to use this money to buy flour, sugar, baking powder, cooking oil, vanilla, kitchen utensils, and plastic bags to start up her pancake business.
