Most of the inhabitants work in agriculture and animal breeding, since it is an area of lush vegetation. Ligia lives in this place. She is 29 years old, married, with two children aged eight and four years who are studying in school. Her husband works in a number of services. 

Ligia works raising chickens, to earn some money of her own for the benefit of the household. By season, she has even up to 200 chickens in a shed of her house, since it has sufficient space. She feeds them for three months, then she hands them over to merchants that arrive at her home to buy her animals and take them to the city and provincial markets. She's been doing this work for over three years, thus making some money on her own.

This loan is to buy feed and medicine for the chickens. She's been a member of the credit group since almost its inception, and she likes it because the loans greatly help her to get ahead. Her dreams are to give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicine for chickens.

loans.name: Segundo Cesar

texts.es: Segundo tiene 59 años de edad, este señor se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, comenta que desde muy joven se dedicaba al ordeño de las vacas y cuando se caso siguió con esta actividad, al pasar algunos años de  seguir la rutina de madrugar a las 4 de la mañana para ordeñar sus vacas sin importar el clima ya que vive en el campo y por lo general las mañanas  son lluviosas y frías,  Segundo comenta  que debido a esta actividad su esposa se enfermo de los huesos, y que tuvieron que retirarse de de la crianza de ganado y decidió dedicarse al comercio de ganado en las feria de las ciudades más cercanas, Segundo va a invertir el crédito en la compra de terneros y vacas para venderlas y de ahí obtener alguna ganancia, misma de la que aspira seguir adelante con el tratamiento de su esposa y darle la educación a su hija de 16 años que es la menor y está asistiendo al colegio.
texts.en:
Segundo is 59 years old. This gentleman works farming and raising livestock. He says he started milking cows when he was very young and that when he got married he continued in this business. For several years he followed his routine of getting up at four in the morning to milk his cows regardless of the weather. He lives in the country and the mornings are generally cold and rainy. Segundo says that this work caused his wife to become ill with bone disease, which is why they had to retire from raising cattle and decided to work selling livestock in the markets of nearby towns. 

Segundo will invest this loan in purchasing calves and cows to sell. He intends to make enough of a profit to keep up with his wife's treatment and give his youngest daughter, who is sixteen and in school, an education.

loans.use: to buy calves and cows.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
Con la ilusión de salir adelante y superarse, Maria desea montar un negocio de comidas rápidas en un local ubicado al frente de su casa en el municipio de Itagüí.

Esta idea surge a partir de la motivación que le dio su hijo mayor que la impulsa para montar este negocio y así generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Aunque ella siempre ha querido ser independiente, nunca había tenido el valor de arriesgarse a iniciar con un negocio; pero ahora se siente con la fuerza y capacidad para hacerlo.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar todos los elementos necesarios para el montaje de su negocio tales como 1 congelador, nevera, 1 carrito de comidas con freidora, insumos e ingredientes para la preparación de comidas.

Con estos elementos podrá iniciar con este proyecto y podrá cumplir así su sueño de ser independiente.

Con el apoyo a este crédito estarás impulsando las ideas emprendedoras de una madre colombiana!
texts.en:
With the hope of success and of improving herself, Maria would like to start up a fast food business at a location in front of her house in the municipality of Itagüí. 

This idea stems from the motivation of her oldest son, who encouraged her to start up a business to earn the necessary income to sustain her household. Although she always wanted to be independent, she never dared to start up a business. However, now she feels strong and capable to do so.

She is applying for a loan to buy all of the necessary elements to start her business, such as a refrigerator, a freezer, a food cart with a deep fryer, supplies, and ingredients to prepare food.

With these items, she will be able to start her project and accomplish her dream of being independent.

With the support of this loan you will be encouraging the enterprising ideas of a Colombian mother!

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, a freezer, a deep fryer, supplies and ingredients.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en: In 2012, Leonida learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it extends to micro-entrepreneurs like her. Leonida tried her luck with a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her earnings to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. Leonida is borrowing another amount to pay for farm inputs and fertilizer. This will give her farming income a big boost. Leonida looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Meet Mariam, a 39-year-old married mother of four who started selling clothes from her house two years ago to support her husband in covering their family's increasing living expenses. She used to work as an accountant, but her low income forced her to start her own business. 

Still working hard to develop her enterprise properly, Mariam has requested her second loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay for her children's  school tuition fees. A borrower in good standing, she plans to open her own clothing shop in the future so as to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To pay for her children's school tuition fees

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina has been helping her husband for many years, working on their own farm to make a living. They earn well enough that she had successfully repaid her previous loan, used for motorcycle registration costs. 

Recently, Josefina took a new loan to buy new tires. She hopes to save more to buy an additional motorcycle, for expansion of the services.

In the future, Josefina's plan is to save her returns in order to finance the studies of her children.

loans.use: to buy new tires.
